item.description:
For the Second Year running, I Heart Providence will be held at City Hall.

Enjoy Live Music, free hors d'ouvres and meet some of the interesting businesses in and around our wonderful city. And for many of us, an opportunity to see the interior architecture of City Hall.

From the I HEART PROVIDENCE FaceBook post:

Celebrate your love of our fine city with free food, drinks, and a live performance by Miss Wensday &
The New Medicinals. PLUS - A surprise attendee art project!

See what people said last year:

I HEART PROVIDENCE: The People's Confessions
item.how_to_find_us: I'll Hang out at the base of the steps inside City Hall
item.name: I *HEART* Providence
